statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT first_name, last_name, city, state FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_id, address, zipcode FROM customers WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE segment_id = 1 ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT first_name, last_name, address, city, state, zipcode FROM customers WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY city ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, email, segment_id FROM customers WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'Germany' AND segment_id = 2 ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customer_segments
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE location_id = 3
SELECT segment_name, customer_id FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT location_name, country FROM locations WHERE location_id = 5
SELECT * FROM locations
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE 'A%' AND location_id IN (1, 2);

SELECT customer_id, location_name, segment_name FROM customer_segments INNER JOIN locations ON customer_segments.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE locations.country = 'USA' OR locations.country = 'Canada';
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(customer_id) as total_customers FROM customer_segments GROUP BY segment_name HAVING total_customers > 5 ORDER BY total_customers DESC;

SELECT location_name, COUNT(customer_id) as total_customers FROM customer_segments INNER JOIN locations ON customer_segments.location_id = locations.location_id GROUP BY location_name ORDER BY total_customers ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segment_data;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM location_data;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, location_name FROM customer_data JOIN location_data ON customer_data.location_id = location_data.location_id;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, city FROM customer_data JOIN location_data ON customer_data.location_id = location_data.location_id WHERE state='California';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segment_data WHERE LENGTH(segment_description) > 50;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM location_data WHERE state='Texas');
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%') ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, locations.city FROM customers JOIN locations ON customers.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT MAX(created_at) FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE location_id = '12345';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, location_name FROM customers c JOIN locations l ON c.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT customer_id, segment_name, segment_description, city, state FROM customer_segments cs JOIN locations l ON cs.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_segment = customer_segments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_location_mapping WHERE customer_id = 100 AND location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_segment = 'Premium';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, l.city, l.state, l.country FROM customers c JOIN locations l ON c.location_id = l.location_id;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, s.segment_name, l.city, l.state, l.country FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments s ON c.customer_segment = s.segment_name JOIN locations l ON c.location_id = l.location_id;
